content: crochet this beautiful flower blanket to snuggle up in on cold days this blanket is designed to be an heirloom piece that will be loved and used for years to come if you re looking for a fun project that will challenge you and help you learn some new techniques then this is the perfect project for you step-by-step pictures are included to make the crochet process easier and more enjoyable this blanket is made up of hexagons and trapezoids that are **joined as you crochet** join as you go method so there is no sewing involved **the free pattern for the baby blanket can be found here 1 along with instructions to create a custom sized blanket ** > buy 2 patterns get 1 free with coupon code freepattern add all 3 patterns to your cart and use the coupon code discount will be applied at checkout crochet skill level intermediate * medium 4 worsted weight yarn is used for this design * the pattern is written in us crochet terminology * this pattern is written in english * finished dimensions of the original baby blanket throw 33 wide x 37 long * the pdf includes instructions for 6 blanket sizes including number of yards needed and number of motifs for each size baby lapghan small and large throw queen and king * the pdf also includes step-by-step pictures and video tutorials * the printable pdf is a total of 21 pages * 4 video tutorials are included in the pdf to help you with the hexagon motif trapezoid motif join as you go method and the crab stitch border other details *6 0mm crochet hook needed *medium 4 worsted weight yarn is used for this design * pattern has been tech edited 1 https //thispixiecreates com/how-to-crochet-the-flower-power-blanket/
